backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Help me set the agenda to review the progress of Project Alpha with the product and marketing team to get confirmation we are on track and discuss any blocking issues or risks.

gutts.name: Meeting Context Retrieval
gutts.capability: Gather information about Project Alpha from available sources
gutts.user_goal: Agenda based on actual project state
gutts.evidence: Retrieved Project Alpha docs: timeline, milestones, status reports, issue tracker

gutts.name: Stakeholder Role Identification
gutts.capability: Understand product team vs marketing team roles and concerns
gutts.evidence: Identified: Product team (feature delivery, tech debt) vs Marketing team (launch readiness, messaging)

gutts.name: Agenda Structure Planning
gutts.capability: Create logical flow for review meeting (progress → confirmation → blockers → risks)
gutts.user_goal: Meeting has clear structure and progression
gutts.evidence: Structured agenda: (1) Progress review 20min, (2) Track confirmation 10min, (3) Blockers 15min, (4) Risks 10min, (5) Actions 5min

gutts.name: Progress Review Items Generation
gutts.capability: List specific accomplishments, milestones, metrics to review
gutts.evidence: Progress items: Feature A completed (85% → 100%), Beta signups (target 500, actual 650), Marketing assets (8/10 done)

gutts.name: Blocker & Risk Identification
gutts.capability: Surface known issues, dependencies, and potential risks for discussion
gutts.evidence: Blockers: API integration delayed 1 week, designer capacity limited. Risks: Feature B scope creep, competitor launch timing

gutts.name: Time Allocation & Formatting
gutts.capability: Assign time to each agenda item and format for distribution
gutts.evidence: Generated formal agenda document with time allocations, sections, discussion prompts, and pre-read materials

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 6 GUTTs
